nodes.title:
After invading Ukraine nearly a week ago, Vladimir Putin has ordered Russiaâ€™s nuclear forces to be on high alert. 

What might he do next, and how should NATO respond? @shashj, The Economistâ€™s defence editor, gives his take.

One goal of Russiaâ€™s advance in Ukraine is to create a â€œland bridgeâ€ that connects the Russian-speaking Donbas, and Russia itself, with Crimea, which it annexed in 2014. 

To achieve its aims, Russia will need to hold its new turf. Can it do that?
